description: Plans for a facility in the west of the Isle of Man were criticised in an independent report.
title: Plans for sewage treatment plant near Peel withdrawn
title_page: Plans for sewage treatment plant near Peel withdrawn - BBC News
maintext: At a public meeting over the plans in May last year, concerns were raised over the cost of pumping sewage uphill to the proposed site, and the removal of more than 100 trees from the area.
